abstract: Iraqi Prime Min Haider al-Abadi softens tone about Saudis during three-day visit to Washington, saying he hopes that relations between them improve.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi of Iraq on a trip to Washington stepped back from earlier remarks about Saudi airstrikes in Yemen and expressed concern that fighting there could fan sectarian tensions.

headline.main: Iraqi Premier Softens Tone About Saudis
headline.print_headline: Iraqi Premier Softens Tone About Saudis

snippet: Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi of Iraq on a trip to Washington stepped back from earlier remarks about Saudi airstrikes in Yemen and expressed concern that fighting there could fan sectarian tensions.
